entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
